text: “læa cng raluk khna thi phracea khxng cea di cæng hı thrab wa nænxn phraxngkh ca sng ma hı mi xanac henux phwk khea cn thung wan ki ya mah sung phu thi ca bangkhab khukhey phwk khea dwy kar thrman xan rayræng thæcring phracea khxng cea nan thrng pen phu rwdrew nı kar lngthosʹ læa thæcring phraxngkh nan khux phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng xendu metta”
